name: EXED EXES
description:
A retro classic from Capcom's arcade line-up in 1985, EXED EXES is a vertically-scrolling shooter that's sure to bring back fond memories. Dodge bullets! Collect fruit! And go for high scores in one of the most furious sci-fi insectoid shoot 'em ups ever made.

This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. See more Virtual Console games for Wii.
